## Education/Work Background

-   Bachelor in Psychology and currently pursuing an MS in Data Analytics and Computational Social Science.

-   Currently working as a Computational Social Scientist at a supply chain technology company. Previously engaged several applied research settings, such as a market research agency, a neuroscience institute, and a non-profit.

## R experience

-   Started getting deep into R around May 2022; before that, I had some months of experience in SQL and Python.

## Research interests

-   Interested in modeling and understanding complex social systems, such as social media, economic ecosystems, and supply chains. Also interested in neuropsychology, neuroscience, and mental health in general.

## Hometown

-   Originally from Colima, Mexico; currently living in Washington, DC.

## Hobbies

-   Playing guitar and video games, hanging out with family and friends, traveling, and discovering new bars and restaurants.

## Fun fact
